Laredo.Martin High School (Laredo, Texas):
27.5179°N 99.5063°W﻿ / 27.5179; -99.5063
Raymond & Tirza Martin High School, known as Martin High School, is a secondary institution of learning located in the Laredo Independent School District in Laredo, Texas, United States. Grades 9th through 12th are taught there. It serves students living in central Laredo.
